channel.title: CVE Feed for Synaptics -- Synaptics Fingerprint Driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synaptics -- Synaptics Fingerprint Driver

item.title: CVE-2023-5447|2024-08-02T07:59:44.752Z -- synaptics -- synaptics%20fingerprint%20driver
item.description: Missing lock check in SynHsaService may create a use-after-free condition which causes abnormal termination of the service, resulting in denial of service for the Synaptics Hardware Support App.

item.title: CVE-2023-5447|2024-06-04T17:28:42.274Z -- synaptics -- synaptics%20fingerprint%20driver
item.description: Missing lock check in SynHsaService may create a use-after-free condition which causes abnormal termination of the service, resulting in denial of service for the Synaptics Hardware Support App.
